data.name: Tales of Morrow
data.detailed_description:
Create your tale in a beautiful world full of adventure and exploration! Tales of Morrow is a semi-survival, adventure, action RPG where you can build on your island, start a farm, travel to other islands riddled with ruins from a past civilization, and fight all enemies who oppose you. Here you will encounter a story-rich environment with an extensive selection of weapons, tools and friends you will meet on your adventure. So grab your sword or kick back with a fishing rod under the sunset and begin your story!



Features
- Build anything using resources you collect from the islands
- Explore procedural islands (No two islands are the same!)
- Descend into dark caves and dungeons
- Find treasure and riches on your journey
- Encounter and defeat a wide array of enemies
- Grab your pole and angle for countless fish from common to legendary!
- Start a farm! Scavenge and grow various crops
- Buy and sell with NPCs
- + much more to come!



https://store.steampowered.com/app/1783620/Tales_of_Morrow/

data.short_description: Create your tale! Build your island, fight, farm, and explore an old civilization in this relaxing yet adventurous experience. You decide your fate!
